## RemirrorGetterParams.getObjectNode() method

Get a representation of the editor content as an ObjectNode which can be used to set content for and editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getObjectNode(): ObjectNode;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`ObjectNode`
